feed.title: Archana School of Music and Arts
feed.subtitle: Place to learn musical instruments, piano, guitar, violin, sheetmusic.

entry.title: We are looking for Music Teacher

link.title: We are looking for Music Teacher

entry.content:
Enthusiastic music teachers may join us to share the pleasure and joy of playing musical instruments with young minds

If you are a music teacher. You may contact us to join us as music teacher.
Please contact between 5:00 PM - 6:00 PM (evening) at 8604488758.
Location: Avas Vikas, Kalyanpur, Kanpur.

Thankyou.
entry.summary: Enthusiastic music teachers may join us to share the pleasure and joy of playing musical instruments with young minds

entry.title: Admission-Closed
entry.content:
Admission Closed

This is to inform you that all the classes are suspended and no admissions are taken form next batch. We regret the inconvenience caused.

We will notify when we resume.
